mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "The Anchor Man" and "Trailin' Star" ROUND DANCES "Hi Lili", "Little Red Monkey" and "Down the Lane" SPECIAL FEATURES "Summer Institutes, 1954", "Dallas Highlights", "Plan for Summer Square Dances", "Themes for Party Fun", "Young Man of the Mountain", "Asilomar Faculty - August, 1954", "Beginners' Community Square Dance Program". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "The Square Dance Picture", "Caller of the Month", "Round the Outside Ring", "The Green Sheet", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
